December on the Docks
Here are some special dates – you can find more information on our Facebook Events. LJ Schooners, Bluewater Bay Marina or Bluewater High & Dry.
Chess Night 2024
When: January 3, February 7, March 4, April 1, May 6, June 3, July 9, August 6, Sept. 10, October 8, November 6, December 4.
5th Annual Pinfish Grand Nationals – Winners
Great Day fishing in the Bluewater Bay Marina Complex with 32 teams of anglers! Congratulations to our 5th Annual Grand National Pinfish Tournament WINNERS! 1st
5th Annual Pinfish Tournament – August 6
Time to get ready for the PINFISH GRAND NATIONALS!  August 6, 2016 BWB Marina Pinfish Tournament 2016 Registration Form BWB Marina Pinfish Tournament 2016 FLYER
KAYAK SUP FISHING TOURNAMENT – RESULTS
Fun from the 4th Annual Kayak / SUP Fishing Tournament! Congratulations Mitch Smith, Wes Sites and Kevin Sitcer for taking home the prize money!
National Marina Day 2016 – June 11

About Us
The Bluewater Bay Marina Complex is home to over 120 boat slips. We offer permanent and guest dockage, power, water and fueling station.
The marina is located on the North Shore of Choctawhatchee Bay, 3 miles north of Intracoastal Waterway, or 7.5 miles NE of Destin. Entrance is marked with day marks. Night time approaches are aided by flashing lights on all day marks.
We offer a fully stocked ship’s store and will match most competitors’ prices! Nautical hardware, clothing, Columbia Sportswear, BWB Marina Tervis Tumblers, Rainbow Sandals, Costa Del Mar eyewear, and Gill Foul Weather Gear, snacks, drinks, toiletries, sundries, clothing, souvenirs, galley goods are just a few of the many products available in the ship store. Fully stocked tackle store with fishing and hunting licenses sold at the dry storage facility.
Radio dispatched Marina attendants
WiFi available
Laundry facility
Outside Restrooms & nice, clean maintained showers
Inside Restrooms located in Lobby
Experienced local weather knowledge
Access to U.S. Coast Guard licensed captains available for Gulf crossings
Potable water is available at your slip as well as 110/30 amp and/or 220/50 amp power.
Competitively priced gas and diesel
Free pump-out at fuel dock ($10.00 if we come to your boat slip)
10 lb bagged ice available for purchase.
Courtesy car is available for the local area.
Winn Dixie Grocery, Bank of America, Coastal Bank & Trust, Wachovia banks all located nearby.
We can help arrange for mechanical, electrical, or canvas/sail repair.
Please deposit all garbage in trashcans located on each dock.
There is a dumpster located in the parking lot for larger items. (Inquire at front desk.)
Please help to conserve water by using ‘shut off” nozzles when washing.
NO open grill fires on docks or boats while berthed.
